contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Broadcast | call_letters = XHSAW-TV| station_logo = | station_slogan = | station_branding = Teleritmo| analog = 38 ([[UHF]])| digital = 21.1 ([[UHF]])<br>[[Virtual channel|Virtual]]: 38 ([[Program and System Information Protocol|PSIP]])| other_chs = XHSAW-TV (LP) 64 ([[UHF]], [[Monterrey, Nuevo Le贸n]])<br />[[XHAW-TV|XHAW-TDT]]: 12.6 ([[VHF]], [[Monterrey, Nuevo Le贸n]])| affiliations = [[Teleritmo]]| founded = | location = [[Sabinas Hidalgo]], [[Nuevo Leon]]| callsign_meaning = | owner = [[Grupo Multimedios]]| former_affiliations = [[Teleritmo]]| effective_radiated_power = Analog 300 kW<br>Digital 750kW | homepage = [http://www.multimedios.tv/altavision/ Altavisi贸n]| }} '''XHSAW-TV''' is the [[television call sign]] for the flagship station of the Mexican [[Teleritmo]] entertainment network. XHSAW is located in [[Sabinas Hidalgo]], [[Nuevo Leon]] broadcasts on analog channel 38 and on digital channel 21.1. XHSAW also has a repeater station in [[Monterrey, Nuevo Leon]] on analog channel 64 and digital on XHAW subchannel 12.2.<ref>[http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/nuevoleon/index.htm mexicoradiotv.com: TV in Nuevo Leon]</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.multimedios.tv/altavision/ Altavisi贸n official website] *{{TVQ|XHSAW}} {{Coord|26.19239|-100.09817|type:landmark_region:MX|display=title}} {{Monterrey TV}} [[Category:Independent television stations in Mexico]] [[Category:Television stations in Monterrey]] [[Category:Channel 64 TV stations in Mexico]] [[Category:Channel 38 TV stations in Mexico]] [[Category:Grupo Multimedios]] [[Category:Spanish-language television stations in Mexico]] {{Mexico-bcast-stub}}
